categories: Category:Star Wars: The Clone Wars voice actors

nodes.text: Flo DiRe is an actress who voices Jocasta Nu, an ex-Jedi Researcher and Chief Librarian of the Jedi Archives. She is the official "audio double" of the character played by Alethea McGrath. She appears in four episodes of the Star Wars: The Clone Wars television series, one episode produced in 2009, two in 2010 and one in 2014..

Flo Di Re also voice acted the Elder in the post-apocalyptic Fallout 2 computer game in 1998. She appears in the opening CGI sequence, and as the voice of a Talking Head animation of the Elder character in a branching dialogue sequence in the starting village of Arroyo.
In the intervening 11 years, six of the seven projects she appeared in had science-fiction or fantasy themes.
Christopher Neme at the Internet Movie Database
